すべてのパッケージの階層

パッケージ階層:
  • gframe.base,
  • gframe.io,
  • gframe.sound,
  • gframe.state,
  • gframe.ui,
  • gframe.ui.event,
  • gframe.util

クラス階層

  • java.lang.Object
    • gframe.io.BinaryIO
    • gframe.util.Bit
    • gframe.util.BitFlag
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent (implements java.io.Serializable)
          • javax.swing.JPanel (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
            • gframe.base.Panel (implements gframe.state.Loop, gframe.state.Typeable, java.awt.event.WindowListener)
        • java.awt.Window (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
          • java.awt.Frame (implements java.awt.MenuContainer)
            • javax.swing.JFrame (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • gframe.base.Frame (implements java.lang.Runnable)
    • java.util.EventObject (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • gframe.ui.event.MenuEvent
    • gframe.io.FontReader
    • gframe.io.ImageReader
    • gframe.base.Input (implements java.awt.event.KeyListener)
    • gframe.ui.MapChip
    • gframe.ui.Menu (implements gframe.state.Drawable)
    • gframe.ui.MessageWindow (implements gframe.state.Drawable, gframe.state.Updatable)
    • gframe.sound.Midi
    • gframe.state.StateMachine<K> (implements gframe.state.Loop)
    • gframe.io.TextIO
    • gframe.ui.TileMap (implements gframe.state.Drawable)
    • gframe.util.UnsignedByte
    • gframe.sound.WaveFile (implements java.lang.Runnable)
    • gframe.sound.WavePlayer (implements gframe.state.Updatable)
    • gframe.sound.WaveSource
    • gframe.io.XmlReader
    • gframe.io.ZipReader

インタフェース階層

  • gframe.state.Drawable
    • gframe.state.Loop (同様に extends gframe.state.Inputable, gframe.state.Updatable)
      • gframe.state.State
  • gframe.state.Inputable
    • gframe.state.Loop (同様に extends gframe.state.Drawable, gframe.state.Updatable)
      • gframe.state.State
  • gframe.ui.event.MenuListener
  • gframe.state.Typeable
  • gframe.state.Updatable
    • gframe.state.Loop (同様に extends gframe.state.Drawable, gframe.state.Inputable)
      • gframe.state.State
